components.description: Schwinn 'N Litened aluminum with Comfort Tuned geometry, Epicenter seat stays, removable derailleur hanger, rack and WB bosses.
Pro Max alloy 3-finger with reach adjust and Kraton insert on lever blade
SR Suntour FD-XR05 down pull 31.8 clamp (F), SRAM ESP (R)
Bio Tuned Ergonomic Components dual density anatomical design
700C x 40 smooth rolling all weather tread
Pro Max alloy linear pull with linear spring & Multi-Condition pads. (F), Pro Max alloy linear pull with linear spring & Multi-Condition pads. (R)
Pro Max alloy linear pull with linear spring & Multi-Condition pads.
Alloy Adjustable 55 degree movement with 180mm quill insertion and removable cap
Comfort Tuned Super Soft with memory foam and special waterproof stretch cover
Alloy suspension with micro adjust head, pre-load adjust with 35mm travel
